The four types of release of the heart [: The limitless release of the heart
The release of the heart through nothingness
The release of the heart through emptiness
The signless release of the heart
The way in which these things differ in: Spreading a heart full of love
Spreading a heart full of compassion
Spreading a heart full of rejoicing
Spreading a heart full of equanimity
The way in which they mean the same thin: Greed, hate, and delusion are makers of limits
The unshakable release of the heart is said to be the best kind of limitless release of the heart
Greed, hate, and delusion are makers of signs
The unshakable release of the heart is said to be the best kind of signless release of the heart
